name: Laser Rifle, Disposable, Alternate (AltDLR-14)
description: Alternate version of the laser rifle. The weapon fires a coherent beam of photons at the target. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
